title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Amazon revamps Fire TV, launches its own ‘Artline’ televisions with frames at CES
items.description: Fire TV's new interface focuses on your content and offers easier, speedier navigation, Amazon says.

items.title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
items.description: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player a...

items.title: Google previews new Gemini features for TV at CES 2026
items.description: Google TV will let you ask Gemini to find and edit your photos, adjust your TV settings and more.

items.title: Hacktivist deletes white supremacist websites live onstage during hacker conference
items.description: A hacker known as Martha Root broke in and deleted three white supremacist websites at the end of a talk during the annual hacker conference Chaos Com...

items.title: The 2026 BMW iX3 voice assistant will be powered by Alexa+
items.description: The launch is one part of Amazon's effort to bring its LLM-powered voice and digital assistant to every device — whether handheld or in the driver's s...

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold Hands On: This Is the Phone-Tablet Hybrid You're Looking For
items.description: At CES 2026, we went hands-on with the three-panel Samsung tablet that folds up to the size of a (large) phone.

items.title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
items.description: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agen...

items.title: Lego Smart Bricks introduce a new way to build — and they don’t require screens
items.description: Lego developed a custom ASIC chip that allows its new Ssmart Bricks to pick up on signals from surrounding Smart Tags that dictate how it should make ...

items.title: LG’s new OLED TV is just 9mm thick
items.description: This year LG is showing off its manufacturing chops at CES with a new Wallpaper OLED TV that is just 9mm thick.

items.title: Offshore wind developers sue Trump administration for halting $25B in projects
items.description: The lawsuits seek to reverse the Department of the Interior's stop-work order, which affected five offshore wind projects off the Eastern Seaboard.
